            Bio
            Abhishek Kumar is a classically trained botanist and plant ecologist living in Chandigarh. His research focuses the patterns and processes of plant distribution and diversity in Indian Siwaliks. He frequently collaborates with researchers who study plant ecology, community ecology, and biogeography.
            
            
            Education
            Panjab University | Chandigarh, IN
            PhD in Botany (Plant Ecology) | December 2017 - Present
            Panjab University | Chandigarh, IN
            MSc in Botany | July 2015 - May 2017
